SEARCH
Package it.unipv.posfw.orbit.database

Class FacadeDB

java.lang.Object
it.unipv.posfw.orbit.database.FacadeDB
public class FacadeDB extends Object
facade class that provides a simplified interface to interact with the database helper. implements the singleton pattern.

    • login

      public User login(String nickname, String password) throws UserNotFoundException, WrongPasswordException
      authenticates a user by querying the database.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the user's nickname
      password - the user's password
      Returns:
      the populated user object if found
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the nickname does not exist
      WrongPasswordException - if the password does not match

      Parameters:

      game - the game to be purchased
      Throws:
